categories.description: An array of category strings corresponding to the tag cloud items. This allows highlighting and filtering of items.

color.description: The color of the text. Will be overridden by any color defined in the style option. The default value comes from the CSS and varies based on theme.

shortDesc.description: The description of the item. This is used for customizing the tooltip text.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of the item text.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the item text.

value.description: The value of this item which will be used to scale its font-size within the tag cloud.
